name: Ammonia Alchemist
description:
Ammonia Alchemist is a 2D top-down shooter game where the players play as an alchemist who uses ammonia(fart) to charge his weapons and fight against monsters at the end of the world. The player’s objective is to survive as long as possible and earn the highest score possible. The player will level up based on score increments to increase their gun performances and character attributes in order to defeat the monster waves.

  • The fast-paced and easy-to-operated battle system
  • Unique player ability and attacking 
  • Fart animation and sounds
  • Ever-evolving weapon enhancements

Game Design: Mudi Li, Kerry Zhang

Art: https://penusbmic.itch.io/, craftpix.net

Coding: Mudi Li, Kerry Zhang

Sound Effects: soundsnap.com, freesound.org
